statements: DELETE FROM plastic_recycling WHERE id = 5 AND date = '2021-08-20'
DELETE FROM plastic_recycling WHERE total_bottles < 100 OR recycled_bottles >= 50
DELETE FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycling_status = 'Recycled' AND weight_kg > 2
DELETE FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE total_bottles_recycled < total_bottles_received;
DELETE FROM PlasticBottles WHERE recycled = FALSE AND landfill = TRUE;
DELETE FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_name = 'Central Landfill';
DELETE FROM landfill_records WHERE landfill_id = 3 AND quantity > 100;
